titles.title: Extending Anti-Terrorism Protections Act of 2025
Extending Anti-Terrorism Protections Act of 2025
A bill to provide the Secretary of Homeland Security with the authority to temporarily extend the duration of protections provided under the SAFETY Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
